content.raw:
Here are the reasons I chose this method:

1. I wanted to try something different. (Not a great reason, but I like to have fun).

1. Templates affect compile time. Also not a great reason, especially since this library is so small.

1. Templates complicate the creation of scripting interfaces. This is my primary reason.
content.html:
Here are the reasons I chose this method:

  1. I wanted to try something different. (Not a great reason, but I like to have fun).

  2. Templates affect compile time. Also not a great reason, especially since this library is so small.

  3. Templates complicate the creation of scripting interfaces. This is my primary reason.
